  physical_appearance: This is a map of Southeast Asia in the mid 17th century and its title can be found at the top. It is a colourful illustration
 charts the numerous oceans of the region
 has three cartouches
 one coat of arms
 and several sailing vessels

 Hendrik
 1597-1651 Nederlandsche Oost-Indische Compagnie Nautical charts

  sgcool_label_text: Henricus Hondius\u0027s 1636 map of Southeast Asia was based on Willem Blaeu\u0027s map from the previous year. Both maps were vast improvements from earlier maps of the region
 and present the extent of the trading influence of the Dutch East India Company. This map features a dedication in Latin to the wealthy Dutch merchant Christophoro Thisio.

metadata.title_text: Henricus Hondius’s map of Southeast Asia
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a map of Southeast Asia in the mid 17th century and its title can be found at the top. It is a colourful illustration, charts the numerous oceans of the region, has three cartouches, one coat of arms, and several sailing vessels
metadata.subject_terms_2: Business Southeast Asia Hondius, Hendrik, 1597-1651 Nederlandsche Oost-Indische Compagnie Nautical charts
metadata.subject_terms_3: Geographical areas and countries Trade and industry
metadata.sgcool_label_text: Henricus Hondius's 1636 map of Southeast Asia was based on Willem Blaeu's map from the previous year. Both maps were vast improvements from earlier maps of the region, and present the extent of the trading influence of the Dutch East India Company. This map features a dedication in Latin to the wealthy Dutch merchant Christophoro Thisio.
